channel.title: Palk Strait on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Palk Strait on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Rameshwaram
item.description: After complete rest and rainy night we woke up to find a perfect morning in Madurai. Breakfast at the hotel was quite elaborate and we did a good one before starting for Rameshwaram. The hotel guys were kind enough to give us elaborate maps which really helped us to exit Madurai without asking for any direction. One thing we noticed in Tamil-Nadu the direction boards are mostly in Tamil and less of English compared to Karnataka.
